articles.description: Five-star wideout Jeremiah Smith becomes Ohio State's second commitment in the 2024 cycle and yet another premier talent Brian Hartline has landed.
articles.content:
Brian Hartline had already dominated wide receiver recruiting for Ohio State in the 2023 cycle. 
And wouldnt you know it, but the OSU wide receivers coach is at it again for 2024.
